title: Marin Matoš
text:
Marin Matoš (born 26 January 1989) is a <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>n <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player who plays for <a href="NK%20Lu%C4%8Dko">NK Lučko</a> in the <a href="Croatian%20Second%20Football%20League">Druga HNL</a>.
Career.
On 19 January 2016 Matoš signed a contract with Lithuanian champions <a href="FK%20%C5%BDalgiris">FK Žalgiris</a>.
